io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui

Class TextComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.Component
      • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.TextComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextBox, TextField

    public abstract class TextComponent
extends Component
    The root class providing text input support.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

      • isMultiLine

        protected boolean isMultiLine()
        Determines if multiple lines should be allowed in this text component. This method should be overridden to set the value of this component.
        Returns:
        true if multiple lines should be allowed, false otherwise.

      • processKeys

        protected void processKeys(boolean shift,
                           boolean ctrl,
                           boolean alt)
        Processes the keyboard input for this component.
        Parameters:
        shift - true if the SHIFT key is pressed, false otherwise.
        ctrl - true if the CTRL key is pressed, false otherwise.
        alt - true if the ALT key is pressed, false otherwise.
